description:
Louis Hartmann joins forces with the members of the Arne Detective Agency to investigate his father`s murder.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Tanin no Haka o Horu Mono wa, Mizukara Soko ni Ochiiru
Those Who Dig Pits for Others Will Fall in Themselves
Wer anderen eine Grube gräbt, fällt selbst hinein. 他人の墓を掘るものは, 自らそこに陥る
